Global outlook, local focus

We are a global producer and distributor of natural gas-based fertilizers and industrial chemicals with excellent diversification across products and geographies.

sections.markup:
Our operational strength

Our competitive strengths lie in our high quality production facilities, our global low cost producer advantage, our diversified product portfolio, and our strategic locations with access to strong distribution and logistics capabilities.

Our operations

Our operational strength

Our competitive strengths lie in our high quality production facilities, our global low cost producer advantage, our diversified product portfolio, and our strategic locations with access to strong distribution and logistics capabilities.

variables.name: breakpoints
variables.value:
(
    'desktop': size(breakpoint, desktop),
    'desktop-small': size(breakpoint, desktop-small),
    'tablet': size(breakpoint, tablet),
    'mobile': size(breakpoint, mobile),
    'mobile-small': size(breakpoint, mobile-small)
)

variables.name: colors
variables.value:
(
    main: #283A6A,
    accent: #F79727,
    lblue: #F3F5F9,
    mapblue: #4A90E2,
    dgrey: #444444,
    white: #fff,
    lgrey: #A2A1A2,
    mapgreen: #30B6B5
)

variables.name: sizes
variables.value:
(
    inner: (
        desktop: 1040px, // 1400 - ...
        tablet: 700px, // 768 - 1024
        mobile: 320px // 0 - 767
    ),
    breakpoint: (
        desktop: 1440px, // up
        desktop-small: 1200px, // up
        tablet: 1024px, // up
        mobile: 768px, // up
        mobile-small: 375px // up
    )
)

variables.name: font-sizes
variables.value:
(
    body: 18px,
    body-m: 16px,
    body--big: 20px,
    small: 14px,
    small-m: 14px,
    smaller: 12px,
    h1: 44px,
    h1-m: 36px,
    h2: 36px,
    h2-m: 30px,
    standfirst: 22px,
    standfirst-m: 18px,
    timeline: 36px,
    big: 70px
)

variables.name: offsets
variables.value:
(
    s: 5px,
    main: 10px,
    default: 35px,
    l: 20px,
    xl: 50px,
    xxl: 100px,
    xxxl: 150px
)
